name: Redirect Form Spam
tagline: Looks for spam strings in content posted from contact forms. If found redirects the user to a web page of your choice instead of sending it to you.
body:
Redirect Form Spam
====

Looks for spam strings in content posted from contact forms.
If found redirects the user to a web page of your choice instead of sending it to you.
Uses PHP to process the POST request.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
